name: Ugly Hope
description:
DESCRIPTION. Ugly Hope is an ULTRAHARDCORE deceptively simple survival horror that only a few of you can get through. TRY TO SURVIVE!

CONTROL. The game is controlled mainly by moving the computer mouse cursor between the four game areas. Sometimes it will be necessary to press buttons on the screen. Sometimes it will be possible to press some keys ([Esc], [Space]).

PLOT. “My name is Francis. I woke up in an abandoned high-rise building late at night, but I could not find a way out of here, because all exits are walled up. In one of the rooms, I found an old working flashlight. Recently I started to hear strange noises from the distant corridors on the floor. This is not a human... ".

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS. Buy the game, download the archive with the game, unzip the game file anywhere on your computer. PLAY!
